reviews.text: The e-sign platform must automatically detect contradictions between contract body text and margin notes, such as discrepancies like “perpetual” vs. “3 years” in term clauses.
reviews.reason_text: Implies a system behavior to automatically detect discrepancies.

reviews.text: Upon identifying a conflict, the system must set the contract’s STATUS to CONTRADICTION and prevent signature until resolved.
reviews.reason_text: Implies a system behavior to set contract status and prevent signature.

reviews.text: A prompt will appear in the UI for the drafter to select the binding term from a dropdown populated with both conflicting values.
reviews.reason_text: Implies a system behavior to trigger UI prompt.

reviews.text: Once a selection is made, the system must log both the original and selected versions to a `clause_history` audit table, ensuring traceability.
reviews.reason_text: Implies a system behavior to log changes.

reviews.text: Additionally, a real-time Slack alert must be triggered and sent to the `#legal-ops` channel to notify the legal operations team of the flagged contradiction.
reviews.reason_text: Implies a system behavior to trigger Slack alert.

reviews.text: This process ensures legal consistency, maintains compliance integrity, and creates a verifiable record of contract clause edits.
